name: Organising Committee
description: Coordinates and manages all club activities and events at KMIT. The backbone of student activities, ensuring seamless execution of all campus events.
vision: To create a vibrant and well-organized campus culture where every event reflects excellence and student engagement.
mission: Coordinate, plan, and execute all club activities and events with precision and creativity.

name: Public Relations
description: Manages communication and public image of KMIT clubs. Bridges the gap between clubs and the student community through effective communication strategies.
vision: To establish KMIT as a leading institution in student engagement and community outreach.
mission: Enhance the visibility and reputation of KMIT clubs through strategic communication and media relations.

name: Aakarshan Art Club
description: Unleash your creativity through various art forms and exhibitions. A platform for artists to express themselves through painting, sketching, and visual arts.
vision: To foster artistic excellence and creative expression among students.
mission: Provide opportunities for students to explore and showcase their artistic talents through workshops, exhibitions, and competitions.

name: AALP Music Club
description: Explore the world of music through performances and workshops. From classical to contemporary, experience the magic of melodies and rhythms.
vision: To create a harmonious community of music enthusiasts and performers.
mission: Nurture musical talent and provide platforms for students to perform, learn, and appreciate diverse musical genres.

name: Abhinaya Drama Club
description: Express yourself through theatrical performances and drama. Bringing stories to life on stage through powerful performances and creative storytelling.
vision: To cultivate theatrical excellence and dramatic arts appreciation.
mission: Develop acting skills, stage presence, and theatrical production capabilities among students.

name: Riti Fashion Club
description: Showcase style and creativity through fashion shows and events. Where fashion meets innovation and creativity takes center stage.
vision: To establish a platform for fashion enthusiasts to explore trends and express individuality.
mission: Organize fashion shows, styling workshops, and events that celebrate creativity and personal style.

name: KMITRA - E-Magazine & Blog
description: The official magazine and blog platform of KMIT. Amplifying student voices through articles, stories, and creative writing.
vision: To be the premier platform for student journalism and creative expression at KMIT.
mission: Publish quality content that informs, entertains, and inspires the KMIT community.

name: Mudra Dance Club
description: Express through movement with various dance forms and styles. From classical to contemporary, experience the joy of dance and rhythm.
vision: To create a vibrant dance community that celebrates diverse dance forms.
mission: Train students in various dance styles and provide platforms for performances and competitions.

name: Recurse Coding Club
description: Enhance your programming skills and participate in hackathons. A hub for coders, developers, and tech enthusiasts to learn and innovate.
vision: To build a strong community of skilled programmers and problem solvers.
mission: Conduct coding workshops, hackathons, and competitive programming sessions to enhance technical skills.

name: Traces of Lenses Photography Club
description: Capture moments and learn the art of photography. From basics to advanced techniques, explore the world through your lens.
vision: To develop a community of skilled photographers who capture the essence of campus life.
mission: Teach photography techniques, organize photo walks, and showcase student photography through exhibitions.

name: Vachan Speakers Club
description: Develop public speaking and communication skills. Build confidence, articulate ideas, and become an effective communicator.
vision: To empower students with exceptional communication and leadership skills.
mission: Conduct workshops, debates, and speaking events to enhance public speaking and interpersonal skills.

name: Kreeda Sports Club
description: Promote fitness and sportsmanship through various sports activities. From cricket to badminton, stay active and healthy.
vision: To foster a culture of fitness, sportsmanship, and athletic excellence.
mission: Organize sports events, tournaments, and fitness activities to promote physical well-being.

name: Rotaract Club
description: Engage in community service and leadership development. Making a difference through social initiatives and community outreach programs.
vision: To develop future leaders committed to service above self.
mission: Organize community service projects, leadership workshops, and social initiatives for positive impact.
